H0.text: Heat is what hyperthermophiles, exemplified by organisms that grow in geysers, "love."

H1.text: Humidity is what hyperthermophiles, exemplified by organisms that grow in geysers, love.

H2.text: Cold is what hyperthermophiles, exemplified by organisms that grow in geysers, "love".

H3.text: Rainfall is what hyperthermophiles, exemplified by organisms that grow in geysers, love.
